content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Of course, Mr. Li. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. May I ask what kind of budget you have in mind for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, but I am also willing to pay a reasonable amount. My goal is to be on good terms with my landlord.

Thanks for your help, Mister Heine.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
I understand your position, Mr. Li. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. However, I also want to make sure that I am treating my tenants fairly and providing them with a comfortable living space.

Based on the information you've provided, I believe that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you be willing to discuss a rental price that is within your budget and also takes into consideration the value of the apartment and the costs associated with maintaining it?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I am willing to discuss a rental price that is within my budget and also takes into consideration the value of the apartment and the costs associated with maintaining it.

Thanks for your help, Mister Heine.

How about x Euros per month?

I agree to the price of x Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your prompt response, Mr. Li. Based on the information you've provided, I believe that a rental price of x Euros per month would be reasonable and competitive in the Mannheim rental market.

However, before we can finalize the rental agreement, I would like to clarify a few points. Firstly, would you be willing to sign a lease agreement for a minimum of one year? This will provide me with greater stability and security in terms of my rental income.

Secondly, would you be able to pay the rental price in advance on a monthly basis? This will help me to better manage my cash flow and ensure that I am receiving timely payments.

Finally, would you be able to provide any references or proof of your ability to pay the rental price on time? This will help me to assess your creditworthiness and make sure that you are a responsible tenant.

If you are able to address these points, I would be happy to agree to the rental price of x Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
